name: bungee
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a strong cord that stretches and has a hook at each end, used to hold things in place: He strapped the boxes to the top of the car with bungees. I'd put the bike on the rack at the back and secured it with a bungy. Synonym
shock cord
beemore/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a long, strong cord that stretches, used in the activity of bungee jumping: He launched himself from the top of a massive crane and plunged towards the ground at high speed on the end of a bungee. In training he runs sideways with a bungee cord wrapped around his waist.
More examplesFewer examplesI would recommend that you bring a roll of tape or a bungee for strapping things in place.To secure your garbage against moose, strap a bungee cord to the lid.They use ten strong bungy cords to hold the canvas down.Would you jump out of a balloon on the end of a bungee for charity?
